```{r}
library(rtracklayer)
library(GenomicFeatures)
library(fs)
library(dplyr)

genome_dir= "/data/genome"
gff_file=file.path(genome_dir,"gencode.vM27.primary_assembly.annotation.gff3")

gff_file %>%
    path_ext_set("bed") ->
    bed_file
```

```{r}
gff_file %>%
makeTxDbFromGFF %>%
  export(bed_file, "BED")
```
